name: Hclib
body:
HCLIB is a library version of the Habanero-C language. 
This distribution contains an implementation of HCLIB built on top of the Open Community Runtime (OCR).

# HCLIB Installation

See the `INSTALL` file for detailled installation instructions.

# Writing programs using HCLIB

HCLIB defines a C-based interface in the `hclib.h` header file. 
Just use the include directive in your program to import the interface:

    #include "hclib.h"

# Linking with HCLIB

If you set the `HCLIB_ROOT` and `LD_LIBRARY_PATH` environment variable as described in the `INSTALL` file, the command line should look like the following:

    gcc -g -locr -lhclib -I${HCLIB_ROOT}/include your_program.c
